I got this by running the following against commit d65c61f:

```
export GOPATH=/home/vagrant/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go:/home/vagrant/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/Godeps/_workspace
go test -c k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/controller/framework
while true; do GOMAXPROCS=4 ./framework.test -test.run TestUpdate; if [ $? != 0 ]; then break; fi; done
```

There have been previous attempts to fix this:
- #13058
- #14881

It appears it's still an issue :cry: 

We're also seeing it in OpenShift (https://github.com/openshift/origin/issues/5389), although our code hasn't pulled in the fix from #14881 quite yet.
